112 inline CVector3d::CVector3d(double x, double y, double z)

182 inline CVector3d CVector3d::operator-() const

189 inline CVector3d CVector3d::operator+(const imath::TVector<3>& vector) const
190 {
191  return CVector3d(GetX() + vector[0], GetY() + vector[1], GetZ() + vector[2]);
192 }
193 
194 
195 
196 inline CVector3d CVector3d::operator-(const imath::TVector<3>& vector) const
197 {
198  return CVector3d(GetX() - vector[0], GetY() - vector[1], GetZ() - vector[2]);
199 }

202 
203 inline CVector3d CVector3d::operator*(double scalar) const
204 {
205  return CVector3d(GetX() * scalar, GetY() * scalar, GetZ() * scalar);
206 }
207 
208 
209 
210 inline CVector3d CVector3d::operator/(double scalar) const
211 {
212  if (qAbs(scalar) < I_BIG_EPSILON){
213  scalar = (scalar > 0)? I_BIG_EPSILON: -I_BIG_EPSILON;
214  }
215 
216  return CVector3d(GetX() / scalar, GetY() / scalar, GetZ() / scalar);
217 }
